title: Windows 10 Texture Bugged
body: So today i updated my windows 10 and when i join a league game my textures are all screwed up. Everything is red and blue and it almost looks like a 3-d movie. Any fixes available would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey ItsEcey,

This can happen when you update your Nvidia Drivers. It'll sometimes automatically turn on Stereoscopic 3D. You can solve this by following these steps:

- Open the NVIDIA control panel
- Navigate to the 'Stereoscopic 3D' dropdown on the righthand side
- Click the 'Set up Stereoscopic 3D' and uncheck the 'Enable Stereoscopic 3D' box.

Otherwise, you can do it in game by simply pressing CTRL+T to toggle Stereoscopic 3D. Thanks!
